title: ROOF GARDENING
details: Build your own Roof Garden. Our options vary from providing fresh food, temperature control,medicinal plants to decorative options - as per your requirement.

title: INDOOR GARDENING
details: Don't have place in your roof? Let's build your own garden inside your home. We have a wide range of plants that are suitable for indirect sunlight and perfect for your balcony or veranda.

title: LANDSCAPING
details: Our landscape designer creates plans for outdoor spaces, including large-scale commercial landscapes as well as both large and small residential properties
